posts.post_title: FS - T206 Walter Johnson Portrait SGC 1 - Big border $OLD
posts.post_content: Up for sale a T206 Walter Johnson Portrait P150 with a huge top border graded SGC 1.  $OLD price includes shipping, thanks for looking.  Bob Intrieri
